about_the_game:
Purchasing the Pro Version makes you one of our dedicated supporters, who enjoy using the program without limitations and also want to see it being developed further.

Features:
- Adds more logos to choose from
- Adds the option to remove the logo completely
- Enables removing the default bra on female characters
- Enables exporting in full size on transparent backgrounds - big animals and items can be captured in full scale, without overlapping the character
- Increases concurrently usable devices count from 3 to 10
- Enables "Claim for free" on newly released packs instead of the 6 month wait period
- Grants the right to use the pictures without referencing ePic Character Generator as the source
